files.patch:
@@ -160,0 +160,3 @@
+                // get rid of "{@snippet :" prefix
+                .replaceAll("\\{@snippet :", "")
+
@@ -163,1 +166,3 @@
-                // remove trailing and leading whitespaces
+                // get rid of last "}" suffix closing the snippet
+                .replaceAll("\\s+}\\s+$", "")
+
